p: Recently, there is no precise antiviral regime for the deterrence of HCV infection. Nevertheless, current standard treatment pegylated interferon-α (PEG IFN- α) in combination with ribavirin (RBV) have been employed with certain side effects and slow response rate especially in patients infected with HCV genotype 1a and1b [ 11, 12]. Now a day, various novel antiviral inhibitors have been accounted showing a promising approach against HCV.
